resources.string: Adidas X 18.1 FG - OFF White/White/Core Black

There\'s no game plan for you. You think fast and play faster. The pitch is your runway and your destination is beyond your rivals\' reach. Sculpted for speed, the adidas X 18.1 FG football boots will feature on the feet of Gareth Bale and Thomas Muller.

Stripped down to the essentials to maximise your speed and control, the X 18.1 features a super-thin speed mesh upper for a direct touch on the ball. Providing optimal lockdown in the midfoot, the boot’s four-way stretch tongue and adaptable lacing system work together to deliver a comfortable fit.

For game-changing stability in the rearfoot, these adidas football boots feature a low-cut Clawcollar design for lockdown, while 3D moulded and cushioned zones in the heel offer a secure fit around the ankle.

Designed to help boost your acceleration off the mark, the X’s perforated Speedframe outsole helps reduce the overall weight of the boot, while its arrowhead shaped studs in the forefoot and round heel studs encourage quick penetration for quick movement on firm natural ground surfaces.
Please note: To achieve the perfect fit, Pro:Direct recommend you go up half a size for the entire adidas X range.
